name: Pizza Vs. Aliens
description:
Created for Odd Weekend Jam 8. Theme: Pizza

Make a pizza while defeating aliens. Instructions are available in game for all three stages. Use the mouse in the first stage and the arrow keys / wasd and either space, enter,z,x, or c in stage 2 and 3.

CREDITS:

Tablecloth background from public domain.

"Android Sock Hop", "Bushwick Tarantella Loop"
